title: Ukraine’s Kursk Op: NATO Nation’s Damage Control As Putin Fumes Over Kursk Op, Says Zelensky… | Hindustan Times
text: Explore Search Friday, Aug 23, 2024 New Delhi o C Subscribe Games E-Paper Sign in My Account Home HT Premium Loan ₹ 10 Lakh Games & Puzzles Real Estate Powered by India World HTCity Entertainment Trending Astrology Lifestyle Education Business Cities Latest News Shop Now Kolkata Doctor Rape Case Live Narendra Modi Ukraine Visit Live Videos Photos Web Stories Sports Delhi News Mumbai News Bengaluru News Technology Quickreads Daily Digest Following Games + 7 more Mumbai News Bengaluru News Technology Quickreads Daily Digest Following Games Ukraine’s Kursk Op: NATO Nation’s Damage Control As Putin Fumes Over Kursk Op, Says Zelensky… world news Published on Aug 23, 2024 09:40 AM IST Follow Us Follow Us Share Via Copy Link A major NATO nation on August 22 made a big claim over Ukraine's incursion into Kursk. German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said, "Ukraine has prepared its military operation in the Kursk Region very secretly and without feedback." The German leader, calling Kyiv's incursion a limited operation, added that the situation is being monitored. Watch for more.
